basic example.good string: This has a [link][0] that will stay put
basic example.good string no translation: This has a [link][0] but will not be translated
basic example.good string with repeated link: This has a [link][0] but the link [repeats][1]
basic example.added redactable content: This has a [link][0] and will have redactable content added
basic example.removed redactable content: This has a [link][0] and will have have a [second link][1] removed
basic example.reused redaction: This has a [link][0] and will add a redaction with the same index
basic example.manufactured redaction: This has a [link][0] and will add a redaction with a different index
basic example.malformed redaction: This [link][0] redaction will have broken formatting
